text: Na so Miyamaratiyaya a manga Mama go so Miyamaratiyaya a manga Babai, na so sabaad kiran na manga Panarigan o saba-ad: Ipushogo iran so Mapiya, go Ipushapar Iran so marata: Go Iputhindug Iran so Sambayang, go Puthona-in niran so Zakat, go Phagonotan niran so Allah go so Sogo Iyan. Siran man na Ikhalimo siran ndun o Allah: Mata-an! A so Allah na Mabagur, a Maongangun
